articles.author: Craig Hope
articles.title: Steve Bruce DEFENDS his Newcastle record and takes aim at Rafa Benitez - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Newcastle coach was asked on Friday if it was possible for any manager to be successful under Mike Ashley, but Bruce insisted it depended on how success was gauged at the club.
articles.content:
Steve Bruce says even the 'mighty Rafa Benitez' could not do any better than he did at Newcastle last season.
The head coach was asked on Friday if it was possible for any manager to be successful u… [+1799 chars]
